pages.title: Wireless Redstone
pages.text: <item>Redstone Transmitters/$ and <item>Redstone Receivers/$ can wirelessly transmit redstone signals (including <thing>$(l:essentials/circuits)Circuitry/$ signals w/ decimal).$(br2)A <item>transmitter/$ can be linked to one or more <item>receivers/$ with a <item>$(l:essentials/linking_tool)linking tool/$, which will emit the redstone signal going into the <item>transmitter
<item>/$.$(br2)A <item>receiver/$ can only be linked to one <item>transmitter/$ at a time.$(br2)<item>Wireless transmitters/receivers/$ can be right-clicked with dyes to color code them.$(br2)
